TopicTitle: What if Wolfie from KurtJMacs FOB Died?

Articles.Content: Would he end the series? Get a new dog? Continue alone? What do you think?

This is as good a place as any to ask, but why the hell is Kurt just walking in one direction for hundreds of episodes? Surely he would rather spend that time doing something more interesting, or perhaps making a few more KSP videos.

This is as good a place as any to ask, but why the hell is Kurt just walking in one direction for hundreds of episodes? Surely he would rather spend that time doing something more interesting, or perhaps making a few more KSP videos.
Thats his "mission".
He'd continue. Wolfie is good and all, but end the series!? It's a wolf.
He probably dies all the time, and just gets a new one every time when he's not recording.

He probably dies all the time, and just gets a new one every time when he's not recording.
He said that he didn't lost him yet

This is as good a place as any to ask, but why the hell is Kurt just walking in one direction for hundreds of episodes? Surely he would rather spend that time doing something more interesting, or perhaps making a few more KSP videos.

For charity, giving money to children in hospitals. Also, because he can.

OT: I think everyone would die., because it would be so sad.
